124146.<pipipi_high>\n「知の城塞で開かれる 知の祝祭は\n 決められた時:
The Festival of Knowledge, held in the Citadel of Knowledge, is an event that takes place at a predetermined time and is run
simultaneously by all participants. When it's time for the Festival of Knowledge to begin, everyone here will be automatically
transported to the site of the Festival of Knowledge... In the actual event, the tickets to the Festival of Knowledge will be removed
from your possessions when the first question begins. But this is a trial run, so nothing will be lost. Also, if anyone in your party
is outside the Citadel of Knowledge at the time, they will be removed from the party. Also, just a reminder, if you lose your
connection during the Festival of Knowledge, you'll be disqualified. I recommend checking the line status in the upper left corner
before the start time, and leaving the Citadel of Knowledge if it looks dangerous... When the festivities begin, here's what you
need to do. You have a limited amount of time to find the right numbered door. You've been given a chance... If you get it wrong three
times, you're out. If you can complete all seven questions without being ejected, you'll be rewarded!
